module.name: Calendar
module.description: This module is used to manage calendar and time based events for FreePBX
module.changelog: *16.0.5* FREEI-3690 Updated 3rd party library 'om/icalparser' to latest version *16.0.4* FREEI-3290 *16.0.3* Packaging of ver 16.0.3 *16.0.2* FREEPBX-22109 Add API REST to control Calendars *16.0.1alpha1* 16.0.1 alpha release
